name: Time Bubble (DWMcDonald)
description:
It is complete!

Finally, your time machine is ready to test. Unfortunately, you made a few small errors, thrusting the lab into a bubble of malleable time.

Eliminate the errors, fix the machine, and escape the Time Bubble.

Made with Teddy Dykoff: https://teddy-dykhoff.itch.io/

Additional credits:

Ding: InspectorJ (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/484344/)

Long Ding: Department64 (https://freesound.org/people/Department64/sounds/550252/)

Explosion: Iwiploppenisse (https://freesound.org/people/Iwiploppenisse/sounds/156031/)

Sparks: Tomlija (https://freesound.org/people/Tomlija/sounds/103333/)

Time Bubble: Robinhood76 (https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/332410/)

Time Travel: InspectorJ (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/376415/)

Music:

Signal To Noise by Scott Buckley | https://soundcloud.com/scottbuckley

Downloads available for Oculus Quest and Windows (Oculus Rift).
